title: Week 3
text:
Key Concepts Learned
Summary statistics is useful for investigating patterns. ACS data contains surplus of errors, planners fail to report them.


Coding Techniques

ggplot(data)
aes(x, y,â€¦)
geom_points(colors, size, decorate)



Questions & Challenges
Is kable() mainly for a quick, but comprehensible way to represent a summary analysis?


Connections to Policy
Planners should report MOEs because it affects minorities and at the end of the data, is inaccurate and misleading.


Reflection

Playing with ACS data seems like a great way to feel more confident with R and basic data dissemination.

title: week-04-notes
text:
Key Concepts Learned
sf Package is responsible for reading shapefiles. st_transform() is the key to happiness, st_set_crs() is pain and suffering! WGS84 should be avoided, use available region projections.


Coding Techniques

st_filter()
st_intersects()
st_touches () excludes the field being searched from
st_distance() makes matrix
st_union () is equivalent to a dissolve in ArcGIS Pro



Questions & Challenges
What functions are used for raster data?


Connections to Policy
Spatial representation of tracts.


Reflection

Be very wary of CRS!
